{/* Header Section */}

Welcome to Our Family Tree Website

Discover the rich history and relationships within the family tree of Ksar Ouled Boubaker

{/* Main Content Section */}

About the Family Tree

Our family tree spans generations, starting from the first ancestor, Boubker. This interactive tree allows you to explore family connections from the past to the present. Discover how the generations are interlinked and learn more about your heritage.

{/* Features Section */}

Features

Interactive Family Tree

Click on any individual to see their full family history and relationships.

Search by Name

Easily search for any family member by name to view their position in the tree.

Multi-Generation View

View the family tree from the first ancestor to the present generation.

{/* Footer Section */}
